segments.text: Oh ! ! ! I have a horrible toothache .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should go to the dentist .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , suffer then . If you have a toothache , you have to go to the dentist .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It always hurts . I hate going .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Stop being such a baby . If it really hurts that much , just let them knock you out .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: O . K . , O . K . , I â€™ ll go .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . You'll feel better after you do .
segments.speaker: S2
